entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Norway House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.5°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
